prompts.prompt: I need a Python script that reads Excel files named as Hasta1_gaitx.xlsx and Hasta1_gaitrite.xlsx for multiple patients (up to 30 patients) from a local directory. The script should create a DataFrame named 'hasta_isimleri' which will be populated with the patient names extracted from the filenames of either gaitx.xlxs or gaitrite.xlxs files.
